#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
  //
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  Log_info("Called Put function of kvserver.");
  bool isLeader = 0;
  bool* ptr_isLeader = &isLeader;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  uint64_t* ptr_term = &term;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(ptr_isLeader,ptr_term);
  if(isLeader == 0)
  {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  else if(oplog.find(to_string(oid))!=oplog.end())
  {
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else
  {
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallablePtr(s);
    uint64_t ind = 0;
    uint64_t term = 0;
    uint64_t *ptr_ind = &ind;
    uint64_t *ptr_term = &term;
    bool raft = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallablePtr,ptr_ind,ptr_term);
    Log_info("Back to kvserver put");
    Coroutine::Sleep(200000);
    Log_info("After coroutine Sleep");
    if(oplog.find(s->data_[0])!=oplog.end())
    {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
  }
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  Log_info("Called Append function of kvserver.");
  bool isLeader = 0;
  bool* ptr_isLeader = &isLeader;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  uint64_t* ptr_term = &term;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(ptr_isLeader,ptr_term);
  if(isLeader == 0)
  {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  else if(oplog.find(to_string(oid))!=oplog.end())
  {
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else
  {
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallablePtr(s);
    uint64_t ind = 0;
    uint64_t term = 0;
    uint64_t *ptr_ind = &ind;
    uint64_t *ptr_term = &term;
    bool raft = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallablePtr,ptr_ind,ptr_term);
    Log_info("Back to kvserver append");
    Coroutine::Sleep(200000);
    Log_info("After coroutine Sleep");
    if(oplog.find(s->data_[0])!=oplog.end())
    {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
  }
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  Log_info("Called Get function of kvserver.");
  bool isLeader = 0;
  bool* ptr_isLeader = &isLeader;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  uint64_t* ptr_term = &term;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(ptr_isLeader,ptr_term);
  if(isLeader == 0)
  {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  else if(oplog.find(to_string(oid))!=oplog.end())
  {
    *v = mp[k];
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else
  {
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallablePtr(s);
    uint64_t ind = 0;
    uint64_t term = 0;
    uint64_t *ptr_ind = &ind;
    uint64_t *ptr_term = &term;
    bool raft = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallablePtr,ptr_ind,ptr_term);
    Log_info("Back to kvserver get");
    Coroutine::Sleep(200000);
    Log_info("After coroutine Sleep");
    if(oplog.find(s->data_[0])!=oplog.end())
    {
      *v = mp[s->data_[2]];
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
      //
    }
  }
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  oplog.insert(v->data_[0]);


  if(v->data_[1]=="put")
  {
    mp[v->data_[2]] = v->data_[3];
  }
  else if(v->data_[1]=="append")
  {
    string temp = mp[v->data_[2]];


    mp[v->data_[2]] = temp+v->data_[3];
  }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
